identity.description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

sku.description: The SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) assigned to this resource.

offer.description: The HCX offer, example VMware MaaS Cloud Provider (Enterprise)

secondaryZone.description: The secondary availability zone for the private cloud

strategy.description: The availability strategy for the private cloud

zone.description: The primary availability zone for the private cloud

linkedCloud.description: Identifier of the other private cloud participating in the link.

vsanDatastoreName.description: Name of the vsan datastore associated with the cluster

lunName.description: Name of the LUN to be used for datastore

mountOption.description:
Mode that describes whether the LUN has to be mounted as a datastore or
attached as a LUN

targetId.description: Azure resource ID of the iSCSI target
Azure resource ID of the Elastic SAN Volume

keyVaultProperties.description: The key vault where the encryption key is stored

status.description: Status of customer managed encryption key

expressRouteId.description: The ID of the ExpressRoute Circuit

authorizationKey.description:
Authorization key from the peer express route used for the global reach
connection

expressRouteId.description:
The ID of the Private Cloud's ExpressRoute Circuit that is participating in the
global reach connection

peerExpressRouteCircuit.description:
Identifier of the ExpressRoute Circuit to peer with in the global reach
connection

baseGroupDN.description: The base distinguished name for groups

baseUserDN.description: The base distinguished name for users

name.description: The name of the identity source

password.description:
The password of the Active Directory user with a minimum of read-only access to
Base DN for users and groups.

ssl.description: Protect LDAP communication using SSL certificate (LDAPS)

username.description:
The ID of an Active Directory user with a minimum of read-only access to Base
DN for users and group

vsanDatastoreName.description: Name of the vsan datastore associated with the cluster

id.description: Azure resource ID of the NetApp volume

displayName.description: Display name of the placement policy

state.description: Whether the placement policy is enabled or disabled

availability.description: Properties describing how the cloud is distributed across availability zones

dnsZoneType.description: The type of DNS zone to use.

encryption.description: Customer managed key encryption, can be enabled or disabled

extendedNetworkBlocks.description:
Array of additional networks noncontiguous with networkBlock. Networks must be
unique and non-overlapping across VNet in your subscription, on-premise, and
this privateCloud networkBlock attribute. Make sure the CIDR format conforms to
(A.B.C.D/X).

identitySources.description: vCenter Single Sign On Identity Sources

internet.description: Connectivity to internet is enabled or disabled

managementCluster.description: The default cluster used for management

networkBlock.description:
The block of addresses should be unique across VNet in your subscription as
well as on-premise. Make sure the CIDR format is conformed to (A.B.C.D/X) where
A,B,C,D are between 0 and 255, and X is between 0 and 22

nsxtPassword.description: Optionally, set the NSX-T Manager password when the private cloud is created

secondaryCircuit.description:
A secondary expressRoute circuit from a separate AZ. Only present in a
stretched private cloud

vcenterPassword.description: Optionally, set the vCenter admin password when the private cloud is created

virtualNetworkId.description: Azure resource ID of the virtual network

storagePolicyDefinition.description: Definition of a Pure Storage Policy Based Management policy

storagePoolId.description: Azure resource ID of the Pure Storage Pool associated with the storage policy

sizeGb.description: Volume size to be used to create a Virtual Volumes (vVols) datastore

storagePoolId.description: Azure resource ID of the Pure Storage Pool

failureReason.description:
Error message if the script was able to run, but if the script itself had
errors or powershell threw an exception

hiddenParameters.description:
Parameters that will be hidden/not visible to ARM, such as passwords and
credentials

output.description: Standard output stream from the powershell execution

retention.description: Time to live for the resource. If not provided, will be available for 60 days

scriptCmdletId.description: A reference to the script cmdlet resource if user is running a AVS script

secureValue.description: A secure value for the passed parameter, not to be stored in logs

value.description: The value for the passed parameter

capacity.description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

family.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

name.description: The name of the SKU. E.g. P3. It is typically a letter+number code

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

tier.description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

type.description: Type of managed service identity (either system assigned, or none).

azureHybridBenefitType.description: placement policy azure hybrid benefit opt-in type

displayName.description: Display name of the DHCP entity.

dhcpType.description: Type of DHCP: SERVER or RELAY.
Type of DHCP: SERVER or RELAY.

defaultDnsZone.description: Default DNS zone of the DNS Service.

displayName.description: Display name of the DNS Service.

dnsServiceIp.description: DNS service IP of the DNS Service.

fqdnZones.description: FQDN zones of the DNS Service.

displayName.description: Display name of the DNS Zone.

dnsServerIps.description: DNS Server IP array of the DNS Zone.

dnsServices.description: Number of DNS Services using the DNS zone.

domain.description: Domain names of the DNS Zone.

sourceIp.description: Source IP of the DNS Zone.

displayName.description: Display name of the port mirroring profile.
Display name of the Public IP Block.

connectedGateway.description: Gateway which to connect segment to.

subnet.description: Subnet which to connect segment to.

displayName.description: Display name of the VM group.

members.description: Virtual machine members of this group.
